alert.note: Alert for Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 9:08AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding in low-lying areas caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Portions of the panhandle and southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, in the panhandle Nebraska, Garden. In southwest Nebraska, Keith. * WHEN...Until noon MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas has been reported. The minor flooding is occurring in fields near the river, where it typically occurs. No roads have been impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 808 AM MST, Local law enforcement reported an ice jam near the advisory area. Minor low-land flooding is ongoing. - Some locations that will experience minor low-land flooding include... Lewellen, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Ruthon and Eagle Gulch Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Report any flooding to your local law enforcement office.
